name: ControlledThing
definition: something over which some party exercises some form of control with respect to some situation
label: controlled thing

name: DeJureControl
label: de jure control
definition: control that exists as a matter of law, i.e., legitimate, legal control of something

name: Control
label: control
definition: situation in which some party has the power to direct or strongly influence the direction of the management and policies related to something
explanatoryNote: Control may be direct (explicit) or indirect (implicit), derived through ownership of voting shares, beneficial ownership, other ownership relations, through provisions of a contract, or otherwise.

name: DeFactoControl
definition: control that exists informally and is accepted, although not formally recognized
label: de facto control
explanatoryNote: For example, de facto acquisition or change of control means the acquisition, directly or indirectly, by any person or group of persons acting jointly or in concert, of beneficial ownership of, or control or direction over, sufficient voting shares of some legal entity to permit such person or persons to exercise, or to control or direct the voting of, 50 percent or more of the total number of votes in that entity.

name: ControllingParty
definition: actor that exercises some form of control in the context of some situation
label: controlling party

name: isControllingPartyOf
definition: indicates something that a controlling party has some amount of authority or influence over
label: is controlling party of

name: isControllingPartyIn
definition: indicates the context of control in which the party plays the role of controlling something
label: is controlling party in

name: isControlledPartyOf
definition: indicates a controlling party that has some amount of authority or influence over it
label: is controlled party of

name: isInitiallyControlledOn
label: is initially controlled on
definition: indicates the date or date and time that some level of authority or influence was first put in place

name: involvesControlledThing
definition: indicates something controlled in the context of a control situation
label: involves controlled thing

name: isControlledThingIn
definition: indicates the context of control in which something is being controlled
label: is controlled thing in

name: hasPartyInControl
label: has party in control
definition: indicates the actor in the context of a control situation

name: hasControllingParty
definition: indicates the party that exercises authority or influence over something
label: has controlling party

name: isPartyControlling
definition: indicates something controlled that a controlling party has some amount of authority or influence over
label: is party controlling
